Description: Choose whether or not to believe what the module is saying in a 5-stage blind version of Yahtzee. Tags: 7-segment-displays, 5-digits, 5-triangles, playmat, 5-dice, question-marks
Name: Blindfolded Yahtzee

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about what the module claimed to have, on a round that didn't strike.
